short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dynamics 365 Power Pane is a helper tool designed to integrate with Dynamics CRM/365 application and allow you to manipulate forms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The CRM Power Pane is a helper tool designed to integrate with Microsoft Dynamics CRM application and allow you to manipulate forms or perform actions faster throughout the Microsoft Dynamics CRM application .
